      Parameter[] MixtureModel.param
      Array containing the parameters of the mixture components.
      Methods in jMEF that return Parameter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Parameter PVectorMatrix.clone()
      Creates and returns a copy of the instance.
      Parameter PVector.clone()
      Creates and returns a copy of the instance.
      Parameter PMatrix.clone()
      Creates and returns a copy of the instance.
      abstract Parameter Parameter.clone()
      Creates and returns a copy of the instance.
      static Parameter Clustering.getCenterOfMass(MixtureModel f)
      Computes the center of mass (right-sided centroid) of a mixture model f.
      static Parameter Clustering.getCentroid(MixtureModel f, Clustering.CLUSTERING_TYPE type)
      Computes the centroid of a mixture model.
      static Parameter Clustering.getGeneralizedCentroid(ExponentialFamily EF, MixtureModel f)
      Computes the generalized centroid (left-sided centroid) of a mixture model f.
      static Parameter Clustering.getSymmetricCentroid(ExponentialFamily EF, MixtureModel f)
      Computes the symmetric centroid of a mixture model f approximated by the geodesic walk algorithm.
      abstract Parameter Parameter.Minus(Parameter q)
      Subtracts (not in place) the parameter q to the current parameter p.
      abstract Parameter Parameter.Plus(Parameter q)
      Adds (not in place) the current parameter p to the parameter q.
      abstract Parameter Parameter.Times(double lambda)
      Multiplies (not in place) the current parameter p by a real number \f$ \lambda \f$.
      Methods in jMEF with parameters of type Parameter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double MixtureModel.density(Parameter x)
      Computes the density value \f$ f(x) \f$ of a mixture model.
      double PVectorMatrix.InnerProduct(Parameter v2m2)
      Computes the inner product (real number) between the current vector-matrix \f$ ( v_1 , m_1 ) \f$ and the vector-matrix \f$ ( v_2 , m_2 ) \f$.
      double PVector.InnerProduct(Parameter v2)
      Computes the inner product (real number) between the current vector \f$ v_1 \f$ and the vector \f$ v_2 \f$.
      double PMatrix.InnerProduct(Parameter m2)
      Computes the inner product (real number) between the current matrix \f$ m_1 \f$ and the matrix \f$ m_2 \f$.
      abstract double Parameter.InnerProduct(Parameter q)
      Computes the inner product (real number) between the current parameter p and the parameter q.
      PVectorMatrix PVectorMatrix.Minus(Parameter v2m2)
      Subtracts (not in place) the vector-matrix \f$ (v_2, m_2) \f$ to the current vector-matrix \f$ (v_1, m_1) \f$.
      PVector PVector.Minus(Parameter v2)
      Subtracts (not in place) the vector \f$ v_2 \f$ to the current vector \f$ v_1 \f$.
      PMatrix PMatrix.Minus(Parameter m2)
      Subtracts (not in place) the matrix \f$ m_2 \f$ to the current matrix \f$ v_1 \f$.
      abstract Parameter Parameter.Minus(Parameter q)
      Subtracts (not in place) the parameter q to the current parameter p.
      PVectorMatrix PVectorMatrix.Plus(Parameter v2m2)
      Adds (not in place) the current vector-matrix \f$ (v_1, m_1) \f$ to the vector-matrix \f$ (v_2, m_2) \f$.

      Adds (not in place) the current vector \f$ v_1 \f$ to the vector \f$ v_2 \f$.
      PMatrix PMatrix.Plus(Parameter m2)
      Adds (not in place) the current matrix \f$ m_1 \f$ to the matrix \f$ m_2 \f$.

      Adds (not in place) the current parameter p to the parameter q.
